attributes.action: No UK aid to Ukraine regime that is guilty of war crimes.
attributes.additional_details: The Ukrainian regime is an illegal regime that came to power via an illegal coup backed by the west in order to bring Ukraine under the control of NATO and the EU. The Ukraine regime has committed several war crimes and crimes against humanity such as the shelling and bombing of the East and for the Odessa Massacre. There should be no aid to this regime form the Uk Government. As doing so would be complacent in the war crimes that have been committed by the Kiev Regime.
